[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+  size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+  size_t raw_len = pkt->raw.len;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mraw_len < hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    size_t max_payload = raw_len - hlen;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    size_t tx_space = ifp->tx.len - hlen;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    size_t plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                           [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     struct icmp *icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m@@ [0m[1;36m-800[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m7[0m[39m +[0m[1;36m811[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m12[0m[39m @@[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/aixcc/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-v [0m[35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmp6j4cpsfo[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA heap-buffer-overflow was detected by AddressSanitizer during a libFuzzer run of [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe Mongoose codebase. The overflow occurs in the function `rx_icmp` [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39msrc/mongoose/src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385:18[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, where a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read happens just beyond a [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m34[0m[39m-byte heap allocation. The faulty read is triggered via the fuzzing harness in [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/mongoose/test/fuzz.[0m[1;92mc:106[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, which calls `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand eventually `rx_icmp`.[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIssue Details  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The sanitizer log shows a read of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m at an address immediately following a [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m34[0m[39m-byte region allocated on the heap.  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The offending code is in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385:18[0m[39m, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalled from `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:897:5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The execution path begins in the fuzz harness `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mtest/fuzz.[0m[1;92mc:106:5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, which allocates a `pkt` buffer via `malloc` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m34[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpasses it to the TCP/IP stack simulation.[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mVulnerability Type  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The sanitizer classifies this as a heap-buffer-overflow, indicating that the code[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreads beyond the allocated packet buffer bounds by at least one byte.[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mKey Observations  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow triggers when parsing or inspecting ICMP packet fields in `rx_icmp`,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msuggesting missing or incorrect length checks prior to field access.  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The allocated packet buffer size [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m34[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m matches the offset where the [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mout-of-bounds read occurs, implying that the code expects a larger buffer or [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmiscalculates packet length.  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fuzzing engine used is libFuzzer with an entropic power schedule, running one[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minput [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m times, which repeatedly reproduces the overflow.[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Inspect the implementation of `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to identify which field[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maccess exceeds the buffer and lacks proper boundary validation.  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Review surrounding functions in `net_builtin.c`, notably `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mline [0m[1;36m897[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, to understand how packet length and contents are validated or passed to [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp`.  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Examine the fuzz harness in `test/fuzz.c` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m95[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m106[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to confirm the exact [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocation size of the `pkt` object and how its length parameter is derived from [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz input.  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Audit other packet-parsing routines in `net_builtin.c` for similar missing bounds[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecks, as this pattern may recur in parsing other protocol headers.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -v TESTCASE [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mTESTCASE[0m[39m=[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -f [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ export [0m[33mRUN_FUZZER_MODE[0m[39m=[0m[35minteractive[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mRUN_FUZZER_MODE[0m[39m=[0m[35minteractive[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ export [0m[33mFUZZING_ENGINE[0m[39m=[0m[35mlibfuzzer[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZING_ENGINE[0m[39m=[0m[35mlibfuzzer[0m                                                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m388[0m[39m:    struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m         [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m391[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Set csum to [0m[1;36m0[0m                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m395[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m396[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:149[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m154[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m149[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct pkt *pkt, void *p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m150[0m[39m:  pkt->pay =[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m151[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmg_str_n[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m p, [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m - [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m152[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m153[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m154[0m[39m:static uint32_t [0m[1;35mcsumup[0m[1;39m([0m[39muint32_t sum, const void *buf, size_t len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:890[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m896[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m890[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m891[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                                   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIPv4 options[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m892[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m893[0m[39m:    else[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m894[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m895[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m896[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:802[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m806[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m802[0m[39m:    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m803[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m804[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m805[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m806[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Overview of Root Causes[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The helper function mkpay naively computes payload length by subtracting the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader pointer `p` from `pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len`, without confirming that `p` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mactually lies within the packet’s raw buffer.  A malformed or out-of-range `p` [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39myields an enormous [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor underflowed[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m size, which downstream routines [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnotably [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m trust, leading to heap-buffer-overflow.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In the ICMP receive path:[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - `rx_ip` sets `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and then invokes [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` without verifying that the ICMP header [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39micmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m itself resides fully in the raw buffer.[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - `rx_icmp` reads `pkt->icmp->type` and later does `[0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt->pay.buf, plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` based solely on `pkt->pay.len`, with no check that the raw [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer actually contains `hlen + plen` bytes.[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch Plan[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. Harden mkpay to clamp the payload pointer and length[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Change mkpay so that it first computes the packet’s raw buffer start [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`raw_start = pkt->raw.buf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and end [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`raw_end = raw_start + pkt->raw.len`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - If the provided pointer `p` lies outside [0m[1;39m[[0m[39mraw_start, raw_end[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, treat as [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mzero‐length payload: set `pkt->pay.buf = raw_end` and `pkt->pay.len = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m`.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Otherwise, set `pkt->pay.buf = p` and `pkt->pay.len = raw_end - p`.[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - This guarantees no negative/huge lengths and keeps `pay.buf/len` fully [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwithin the allocated region.[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. Validate ICMP header presence in rx_ip [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbefore mkpay and rx_icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - After computing `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, compute:[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         ```[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         char *icmp_start = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         char *raw_end    = pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         ```[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - If `icmp_start < pkt->raw.buf` or `icmp_start + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mraw_end`, return early [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdrop packet[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Only then call `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and `rx_icmp`.[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   C. Add buffer-length checks in rx_icmp[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - At the top of `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, immediately compute:[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         ```[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         size_t hlen    = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39micmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         size_t pkt_len = pkt->raw.len;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         ```[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - If `pkt_len < hlen`, return [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnot enough data for full ICMP response path[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Compute the true available payload length within the frame:[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         ```[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         size_t max_payload = pkt_len - hlen;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         size_t plen        = pkt->pay.len;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > max_payload[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = max_payload;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         ```[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Compute transmit-space check:[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         ```[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         size_t tx_space = ifp->tx.len - hlen;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > tx_space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = tx_space;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         ```[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Now all downstream access [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp+[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, pkt->pay.buf, plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is within [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msafe bounds.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Preservation of Existing Functionality[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Normal, well-formed packets still satisfy all checks and proceed unchanged [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthrough mkpay→rx_ip→rx_icmp.[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Malformed or truncated packets now cleanly exit early instead of causing UB or[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcrashes.[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No changes to harness, test code, or external libraries; only the core [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpacket-parsing logic in `net_builtin.c` is tightened.[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Potential Side-Effects & Mitigation[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Side-effect: Some malformed packets previously might have had zero-length [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayload fallback; our clamp policy formalizes that behavior and avoids UB. No [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunctional alteration for valid traffic.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Audit: Similar patterns exist in UDP [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->udp` path[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and TCP parsing; [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconsider applying analogous header‐bounds and mkpay bounds checks there to [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muniformly harden the stack.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. References for Implementation[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - mkpay adjustment at range `src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:149[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m154[0m[39m`.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - ICMP header guard in `rx_ip` at `src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:802[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m806[0m[39m`.[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Payload‐length clamping in `rx_icmp` at `src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:382[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m396[0m[39m`.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mBy applying these targeted checks, we eliminate any chance of reading or copying [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpast the heap buffer boundary, while preserving the existing packet-processing [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlogic and fuzzing harness compatibility.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is a heap-buffer-overflow detected by AddressSanitizer in the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, triggered by the fuzz harness [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The patch attempt adds explicit length checks and [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointer‐bounds guards in three places—inside `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, at the top of `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand before invoking `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` in the IP‐proto‐[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m branch of `[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`—to [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprevent reads beyond the end of the `pkt->raw.buf` region. After applying the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpatch, the same heap‐buffer‐overflow remains at the same source line, indicating [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat the overflow point was not mitigated by the added checks.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Initial Issue  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Fuzzer run: `run_fuzzer fuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m`  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Crash:  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - AddressSanitizer reports a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m‐byte read overflow at address `raw_start + [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mraw_len` in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Call stack:  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. `[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. `[0m[1;35mLLVMFuzzerTestOneInput[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. libFuzzer internals…  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Allocation: The packet buffer `pkt->raw.buf` of length [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m bytes was [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocated in `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`malloc` in fuzz.[0m[1;92mc:95[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The overflow read [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moccurs exactly one byte past the [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m‐byte region.  [0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Shadow bytes confirm this is a heap‐left‐redzone violation, with the offending[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mread at the first poisoned byte after the allocated buffer.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch Attempt  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct pkt *pkt, void *p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`:  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Original:  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       pkt->pay = [0m[1;35mmg_str_n[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mp, raw_end - [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Patched:  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       * Calculate `raw_start` and `raw_end`.  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       * If `p` is outside `[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mraw_start, raw_end[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`, set an empty payload.  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       * Otherwise, clamp the length to `raw_end - p`.  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - At the top of `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline ~[0m[1;36m380[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Added:  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39meth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m+[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m+[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->raw.len < hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Inside the ICMP echo‐reply branch of `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`:  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Recomputed `max_payload = raw_len - hlen` and `tx_space = ifp->tx.len - [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhlen`.  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Clamped `pkt->pay.len` by both `max_payload` and `tx_space`.  [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In the IP‐proto‐[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m handling block of `[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m800[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Added a scope that verifies the ICMP header pointer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->icmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and its [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfull size lie within the raw buffer before calling `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Post‐Patch Result  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Re‐ran `run_fuzzer fuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m`: the same AddressSanitizer error appears at[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe same source line [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Call stack and offending address details are identical to the initial report. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The new bounds checks do not prevent the overflow read in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msuggesting the vulnerable access path was not fully covered.[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Areas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The body of `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, especially around line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m, where a byte is read from[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe end of the raw buffer.  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Pointer arithmetic leading from `pkt->raw.buf` through the IP and ICMP headers[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto the payload read.  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Interaction between `[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, and how `pkt->pay.len` is used[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` for that buffer index.  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Upstream packet parsing: verify that `pkt->raw.len`, `pkt->ip`, and [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp` are consistently validated before any dereference or payload [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcomputation.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:797[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m806[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m797[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m798[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m799[0m[39m:    struct mg_connection *c = [0m[1;35mgetpeer[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->mgr, pkt, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m800[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m801[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m802[0m[39m:    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m803[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m804[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m805[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m806[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root-Cause Analysis[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The AddressSanitizer report pinpoints a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read past the end of [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->raw.buf` at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Our previous patch hardened:[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to clamp any start-pointer outside `[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mraw_start, raw_end[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`,  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` IP-proto-[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m branch to bound-check the ICMP header,  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to early-return if `raw_len < eth+ip+icmp` and to clamp `plen`. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Yet we still see a read at `raw_end + [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m`. That tells us that somewhere in [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` we do an unchecked dereference or byte read at offset `hlen + plen`, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mi.e. exactly at the end of the valid buffer.[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Locate the Vulnerable Access in [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Inspecting `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, we find two likely candidates:[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     a[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m The checksum validation reads the ICMP header plus payload:[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        uint16_t recv = icmp->cksum;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        icmp->cksum = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mcsumup[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, icmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != recv[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        Here, if `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + pkt->pay.len` is odd, the checksum loop may do a [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfinal “odd-byte” access, which can read the trailing byte at `raw_end`, causing the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     b[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m The logging/debug macros [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g. `[0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"payload %.*s"[0m[39m, [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->pay.len, pkt->pay.buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m could also read `pkt->pay.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhen formatting.[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Proposed Fix[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. Guard the ICMP checksum routine to never read beyond the available payload:[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ‑ After the top-of-function `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mraw_len < hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`, insert a check that [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + pkt->pay.len` does not exceed `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mraw_end – [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mConcretely:[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     size_t icmp_full_len = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + pkt->pay.len;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp + icmp_full_len > raw_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. Similarly, if any logging or string-formatting is done on the payload, ensure[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwe never pass an unbounded `pkt->pay.len` to `printf`-style functions. Use a [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mmin[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len, max_payload[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` clamp or avoid printing past the end.[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   C. Retain all prior bounds checks:[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ‑ `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`’s clamp for out-of-range `p`.  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ‑ IP-proto-[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m branch check for `icmp` header.  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ‑ `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` early-return on `raw_len < hlen`.  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ‑ Plen clamping to `max_payload` and `tx_space`.[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Implementation Steps[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. In `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`:[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ‑ After computing `hlen` and `raw_len`, keep the `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mraw_len < hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturn;`.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ‑ Immediately before any checksum or payload access, add:[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        char *raw_start = pkt->raw.buf;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        char *raw_end   = raw_start + raw_len;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        struct icmp *icmp_hdr = pkt->icmp;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        size_t icmp_full_len = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp_hdr[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + pkt->pay.len;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39micmp_hdr + icmp_full_len > raw_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Prevent any read of the tail padding byte[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ‑ Then proceed to checksum or echo‐reply logic.[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Audit any `MG_DEBUG`, `mg_hexdump`, `mg_printf` or similar in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat consumes `pkt->pay.len` or prints a `%.*s`; ensure they use the same [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->pay.len` that we’ve just bounds‐checked.[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Do not modify harness or tests—this is purely in `net_builtin.c`.[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. Run `run_fuzzer fuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m10000[0m[39m`. The added guard on `icmp_full_len` defuses[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39many off-by-one checksum read or logging‐induced read past `raw_end`.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Justification & Side-Effects[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This guard is narrow: it only affects `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and only when the ICMP [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader+payload would overrun the buffer.  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - It preserves all existing logic: valid, in-bounds ICMP datagrams still get [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecksum‐verified and echoed.  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - It blocks only malformed or truncated ICMP chunks that would otherwise slip [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthrough due to uneven length/odd‐padding in the checksum code or debug prints.  [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No external or fuzzing harness code is changed. All tests should pass [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munchanged, and valid ICMP packets remain supported.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. References[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Similar pattern in `[0m[1;35mrx_udp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` or `[0m[1;35mrx_tcp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` where packet-length checks guard [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39magainst truncated or over-sized segments.[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This is a classical fix for ASan-reported “odd‐byte” over‐read in [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInternet‐checksum routines.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/25/25 19:50:52][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=39642;file:///home/qqor/aixcc/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=426439;file:///home/qqor/aixcc/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m         [33mexception[0m=[3;91mFalse[0m                                                               [2m                      [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         +  char *raw_end = raw_start + pkt->raw.len;                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +  char *start = [1m([0mchar *[1m)[0m p;                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +  if [1m([0mstart [1m<[0m[39m raw_start || start > raw_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    pkt->pay = [0m[1;35mmg_str_n[0m[1;39m([0m[39mraw_end, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    pkt->pay = [0m[1;35mmg_str_n[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstart, [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mraw_end - start[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m [0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m static uint32_t [0m[1;35mcsumup[0m[1;39m([0m[39muint32_t sum, const void *buf, size_t len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m@@ [0m[1;36m-380[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m17[0m[39m +[0m[1;36m386[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m36[0m[39m @@[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m [0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-                          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+  size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+  size_t raw_len = pkt->raw.len;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp_hdr->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    size_t max_payload = raw_len - hlen;[0m                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m@@ [0m[1;36m-800[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m7[0m[39m +[0m[1;36m825[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m @@[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
