[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is a heap-buffer-overflow detected by AddressSanitizer in the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction `rx_icmp` when processing a fuzzed packet. The overflow occurs on a [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mone‐byte read just past the end of a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m‐byte allocation [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->raw.buf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, triggered[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mby dereferencing or indexing into packet data without sufficient bounds checks.[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA patch was attempted that adds:[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`: validation of the payment pointer `p` against the raw buffer [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbounds.[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`: multiple checks on `pkt->raw.len`, header lengths, checksum [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalidation, and limiting the payload [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->pay.len`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to buffer bounds before [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mproceeding.[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`: additional verification of the ICMP header’s placement within the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mraw buffer.[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying the patch, fuzzing was rerun under AddressSanitizer and the same [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow at `rx_icmp` line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m was reproduced, indicating the attempt [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdid not eliminate the out‐of‐bounds access.[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Initial Issue[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - A fuzz test [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m allocates a packet [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`struct pkt`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m of [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->raw.len` bytes via `malloc`. [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The packet is fed into `[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, which dispatches to `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` when [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m`. [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Inside `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, code reads fields from `pkt->icmp` and then reads or [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcopies payload bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->pay.buf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m beyond the allocated range.[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - AddressSanitizer reports a one-byte read overflow at address  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`, exactly one byte past the region [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x504000000150[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, in `rx_icmp` at `net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[39m`.[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Key Observations in the Initial Log[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The crash happens consistently after loading modules and before any deep [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprotocol logic.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The offending instruction is in `rx_icmp`, triggered by a read through an ICMP[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader pointer.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The packet buffer is only [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m bytes long but the code assumes at least [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39meth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m+[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m+[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` bytes for header processing and possibly more[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfor payload.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Patch Attempt[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The patch redefines `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to clamp `pkt->pay` to lie within [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m .. pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`.[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`:[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Early return if `pkt->raw.len` is smaller than the combined Ethernet, IP, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand ICMP header length [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`hlen`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Compute header pointers [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`icmp_hdr`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and ensure `icmp_hdr + payload length` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdoes not exceed the raw buffer.  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Verify the received ICMP checksum matches a computed checksum before any [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfurther processing.  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Clamp the payload length [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`plen`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to not exceed available raw data or [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtransmit buffer space.[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, inserted a guard to ensure the ICMP header itself lies within [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe raw buffer before calling `rk_icmp`.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Log After Patch[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Fuzzing output again reports an AddressSanitizer heap-buffer-overflow in [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp` at the same source location [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The overflow remains a one-byte read just past the allocated raw buffer [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mregion.[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No new error types were introduced; the patch did not prevent the original [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mout‐of‐bounds access.[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Areas for Further Investigation[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The exact read or index operation at `net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[39m` within `rx_icmp`, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhich still executes despite the new bounds checks.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Interaction between `pkt->pay.len` and `pkt->raw.len`—how `pay.len` is [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalculated in `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and propagated into `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Allocation size and initialization of `pkt->raw.buf` in [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`, to ensure the buffer length covers all header [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexpectations.[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Any implicit assumptions about alignment or structures [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`struct ip`, `struct [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39micmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m that might lead to undercounting required buffer size.[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Adjacent functions [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m that compute offsets or lengths used[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mby `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, to verify consistency of checks and actual data layout.[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNo speculation on root causes or fixes beyond these observations is included; the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreport focuses on facts from the original crash, the attempted patch, and the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubsequent reproduction of the same overflow.[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -v TESTCASE [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mTESTCASE[0m[39m=[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -f [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ export [0m[33mFUZZING_ENGINE[0m[39m=[0m[35mlibfuzzer[0m                                                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ export [0m[33mSKIP_SEED_CORPUS[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m1[0m                                                         [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvm.mmap_rnd_bits = [0m[1;36m28[0m                                                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/dev/[0m[95mnull[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO: Running with entropic power schedule [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0xFF[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m100[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO: Seed: [0m[1;36m1959797726[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO: Loaded [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m modules   [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m5018[0m[39m inline [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-bit counters[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: [0m[1;36m5018[0m[39m [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x55a07de98708[0m[39m, [0m       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/out/[0m[95mfuzz[0m[39m: Running [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m inputs [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m [0m[1;35mtime[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m each.[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mRunning: [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlong[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[35m/src/llvm-project/compiler-rt/lib/fuzzer/[0m[95mFuzzerDriver.cpp[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m327:6[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    #[0m[1;36m5[0m[39m [0m[1;36m0x55a07dc7805f[0m[39m in fuzzer::[0m[1;35mFuzzerDriver[0m[1;39m([0m[39mint*, char***, int [0m[1;39m([0m[39m*[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39munsigned char [0m [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/src/llvm-project/compiler-rt/lib/fuzzer/[0m[95mFuzzerDriver.cpp[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m862:9[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    #[0m[1;36m6[0m[39m [0m[1;36m0x55a07dca3302[0m[39m in main [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/src/llvm-project/compiler-rt/lib/fuzzer/[0m[95mFuzzerMain.cpp[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m20:10[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    #[0m[1;36m7[0m[39m [0m[1;36m0x7f5aedd46082[0m[39m in __libc_start_main [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[35m/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/[0m[95mlibc.so.6+0x24082[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mBuildId: [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m5792732f783158c66fb4f3756458ca24e46e827d[0m[1;39m)[0m                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m803[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         +  char *raw_end = raw_start + pkt->raw.len;                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +  char *start = [1m([0mchar *[1m)[0m p;                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +  if [1m([0mstart [1m<[0m[39m raw_start || start > raw_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    pkt->pay = [0m[1;35mmg_str_n[0m[1;39m([0m[39mraw_end, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    pkt->pay = [0m[1;35mmg_str_n[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstart, [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mraw_end - start[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m [0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m static uint32_t [0m[1;35mcsumup[0m[1;39m([0m[39muint32_t sum, const void *buf, size_t len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m@@ [0m[1;36m-380[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m17[0m[39m +[0m[1;36m386[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m41[0m[39m @@[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m [0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Set csum to [0m[1;36m0[0m                        [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mipcsum[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp_hdr, icmp_full_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != recv_cksum[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Poisoned by user:        f7[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Container overflow:      fc[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Array cookie:            ac[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Intra object redzone:    bb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ASan internal:           fe[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Left alloca redzone:     ca[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Right alloca redzone:    cb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/aixcc/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-v [0m[35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmp6j4cpsfo[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAn AddressSanitizer heap-buffer-overflow was triggered in the function `rx_icmp` [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhen fuzzing the TCP/IP stack in `net_builtin.c`. The crash occurs on a read past [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe end of a small packet buffer. A patch was applied that adds multiple bounds [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecks in three areas—`mkpay`, `rx_icmp`, and the ICMP dispatch in `mg_tcpip_rx`—to[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mverify that headers and payloads lie within the allocated `pkt->raw.buf` region and[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto guard against undersized packets. After rebuilding and rerunning the fuzzer with[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe patch, the same out-of-bounds read in `rx_icmp` is still detected at the [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39midentical buffer offset, indicating the patch did not prevent the overflow.[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial Issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fuzzer invokes `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`, which allocates a small buffer [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`malloc` of length ~[0m[1;36m34[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The packet is parsed and dispatched through `mg_tcpip_rx`, landing in `rx_icmp`. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `rx_icmp`, unguarded pointer arithmetic or `memcpy`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`memset` operations read [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbeyond `pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len`, causing a one-byte heap-buffer-overflow at [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moffset [0m[1;36m0x172[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The ASan report pinpoints the fault at `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m385:18[0m[39m` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minside `rx_icmp`.[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. In `mkpay`:  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Replace the original `pkt->pay = [0m[1;35mmg_str_n[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mp, raw_end - [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` with [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecks that ensure `p` lies within `[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mraw_start, raw_end[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`, otherwise produce an [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mempty payload.  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. In `rx_icmp`:  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Calculate `hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39meth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Early `return` if `pkt->raw.len < hlen`.  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Define `raw_start`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`raw_end` pointers and compute `icmp_full_len = [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + pkt->pay.len`.  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Return early if `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39micmp_hdr + icmp_full_len > raw_end`.  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Zero out and recompute checksum, returning if it does not match.  [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Only then proceed with the ICMP-echo-reply logic, adjusting payload length [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39magainst both buffer bounds and transmit-space bounds.  [0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. In the ICMP dispatch path [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_tcpip_rx`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added a check that `pkt->raw.len` is at least `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39meth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` before calling `mkpay` and `rx_icmp`.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Result  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- After rebuilding and running the fuzzer for [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m iterations, the same ASan [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow arises in `rx_icmp` at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m.  [0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow address and stack trace are identical to the pre-patch crash, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconfirming that the added checks did not cover the triggering scenario.[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The calculation of `pkt->pay.len` in `mkpay` versus actual `pkt->raw.len`—ensure [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat `pkt->pay.buf` and `pkt->pay.len` are never based on stale or misaligned [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointers.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The assumptions about `pkt->icmp` pointer location relative to `pkt->raw.buf` and[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhether earlier parsing steps may leave `pkt->raw.len` inconsistent with actual [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer contents.  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The interplay between fragmentation handling in `mg_tcpip_rx` and the ICMP [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpath—verify that fragmented or truncated packets cannot bypass length checks.  [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Any code that manipulates `pkt->raw.buf` or reallocates it between the ICMP [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdispatch and `rx_icmp` invocation.[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -v TESTCASE [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m796[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrag & IP_MORE_FRAGS_MSK || frag & IP_FRAG_OFFSET_MSK[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m797[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m798[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m799[0m[39m:    struct mg_connection *c = [0m[1;35mgetpeer[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->mgr, pkt, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m800[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m801[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m802[0m[39m:    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m803[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m804[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:381[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m396[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m381[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m382[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m384[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m:    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m386[0m[39m:    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m387[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m388[0m[39m:    struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m389[0m[39m:                          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m390[0m[39m:    struct icmp *icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m391[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Set csum to [0m[1;36m0[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m392[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, pkt->pay.buf, plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Copy RX payload to TX[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m393[0m[39m:    icmp->csum = [0m[1;35mipcsum[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m394[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mether_output[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, hlen + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m395[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m396[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Overview  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   The root cause is that both the ICMP dispatch in `rx_ip` and the fixed‐size [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader chop in `rx_icmp` assume a [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m‐byte IP header.  If the packet’s IHL field is [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m>[0m[1;36m5[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIP options present[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or malformed, then  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` points beyond or before the real [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mICMP start,  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `mkpay` may compute a bogus `pay.len`, and  [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - the static `hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m+…` test in `rx_icmp` is insufficient.  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   We must compute the true IP header length from the packet’s `ver_hl` field, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mclamp it against the actual buffer, and use this dynamic length both to locate the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mICMP header and to bound‐check the ICMP header+payload region.  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch plan  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. In mkpay [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpayload extractor[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Change the start‐pointer test to treat `start == raw_end` as “no payload” [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mi.e. clamp when `start < raw_start || start > raw_end`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Leave the rest as is; this ensures any bad pointer yields `pay.len == [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m`.  [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. In the IP‐to‐ICMP dispatch [0m[1;39m([0m[39mrx_ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Remove the line  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Immediately after verifying `pkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m`, do:  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         • Extract header length:  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           uint8_t ihl = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver_hl & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         • Sanity‐check it:  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihl < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ||  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m               pkt->raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ihl + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             return;  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         • Recompute the ICMP pointer at the correct offset:  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->raw.buf + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ihl[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Then call [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m as before.  [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   C. In rx_icmp  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Replace the static [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m‐byte IP header assumption with a dynamic IHL:  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         size_t eth_hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         uint8_t ihl = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver_hl & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         size_t icmp_off = eth_hlen + ihl;  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         size_t raw_len = pkt->raw.len;  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Early‐exit if any of these fail:  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         • pkt->ip is NULL, or  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         • ihl < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or ihl > raw_len - eth_hlen, or  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         • raw_len < icmp_off + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Compute pointers/limits:  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         char *raw_start = pkt->raw.buf, *raw_end = raw_start + raw_len;  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         struct icmp *icmp_hdr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mraw_start + icmp_off[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Ensure the full header+payload fits:  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         size_t full_len = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp_hdr[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + pkt->pay.len;  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39micmp_hdr + full_len > raw_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Only now read `icmp_hdr->type`, do checksum, and generate the reply.  [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Preservation of existing logic  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All existing echo‐reply code paths and checksum logic are preserved verbatim [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39monce the proper bounds are guaranteed.  [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - UDP/TCP, fragmentation, and other protocols in `rx_ip` remain untouched.  [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Fuzz‐harness entry points and `mkpay`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`rx_icmp` APIs remain unchanged, so [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexisting tests and harnesses continue to work.  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Justification  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Dynamically computing IP header length and validating against `pkt->raw.len` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcloses the gap that allowed `pkt->icmp` to point outside the buffer on packets with[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbogus or extended headers.  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Tightening `mkpay` ensures no negative‐underflow of the size calculation.  [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The new checks in `rx_icmp` guarantee no read or checksum overrun of header or[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayload.  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No external libraries, harness code, or non‐ICMP/test code is modified.  [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Potential side‐effects & mitigation  [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Malformed IP headers having IHL<[0m[1;36m5[0m[39m or >packet length will now be silently [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdropped earlier, which aligns with safe‐fail semantics.  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Existing code handling minimum‐size packets [0m[1;39m([0m[39mno options[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m remains fully [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunctional.  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Thorough fuzzing and unit tests should be run to confirm no unintended [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprotocol‐behavior regressions.  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/25/25 19:56:49][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=448322;file:///home/qqor/aixcc/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=712843;file:///home/qqor/aixcc/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [1m([0mn evals: [1;36m5[0m, patch status: PatchStatus.VULNERABLE[1m)[0m                                   [2m               [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Compute and validate dynamic IP header length[0m                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihl < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m || pkt.raw.len < eth_hlen + ihl[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncate frame to what IP header tells us[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m < pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-      pkt.raw.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[35m/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/[0m[95mlibc.so.6+0x24082[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mBuildId: [0m                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/aixcc/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-v [0m[35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmp6j4cpsfo[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is an AddressSanitizer-reported heap-buffer-overflow in the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction `rx_icmp` within `src/net_builtin.c`, triggered by a fuzz test harness. A [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpatch was attempted that adds multiple boundary checks and header‐length [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalidations in both `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, including verifying IP header [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength, raw buffer bounds, and checksum. After applying the patch, the same [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow at the same source location persists, indicating the patch did[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnot prevent the out‐of‐bounds read.[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Initial issue  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The fuzzer invokes `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`, which allocates a `struct pkt` of[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m34[0m[39m bytes for raw data and then calls `mg_tcpip_rx`.  [0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Inside `mg_tcpip_rx`, when `pkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mICMP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the code computes [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp` as `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and calls `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, then calls `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `rx_icmp`, the code unconditionally reads and processes `pkt->pay.buf` and [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalculates lengths based solely on `pkt->pay.len`.  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - ASan report shows a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m‐byte read beyond the allocated [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m‐byte region, at [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385:18[0m[39m` inside `rx_icmp`.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Key observations in the initial issue  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The bad read is at offset `[0m[1;36m0x172[0m[39m` into a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m‐byte allocation [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;36m0x150[0m[39m`–`[0m[1;36m0x172[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No safeguards before accessing `pkt->pay.buf` in `rx_icmp`.  [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` computes `pkt->pay.len` as the distance from a provided pointer `p` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto the end of the raw buffer, without validating that `p` lies within the buffer.[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Patch attempt  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`: Introduced `raw_start`, `raw_end`, and validated that `p` lies [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min `[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mraw_start, raw_end[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`. If out of range, sets zero‐length payload.  [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`:  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Checks that `pkt->ip` is non‐NULL.  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Extracts IP header length from `ver_hl`, ensures it is at least the size of [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`struct ip`.  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Validates that `raw.len` is large enough to contain Ethernet, IP, and ICMP [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheaders.  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Computes `icmp_full_len = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp_hdr[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + pkt->pay.len` and returns if [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe ICMP header plus payload does not fully reside in the raw buffer.  [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Verifies ICMP checksum before proceeding.  [0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In the packet reception branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: Added similar IP [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader length and raw‐size checks before assigning `pkt->icmp` and calling [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Post‐patch test result  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The fuzz run still aborts with the same heap-buffer-overflow at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m in [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp`.  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The error remains a read beyond the [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m‐byte region, indicating the new checks [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdid not prevent the invalid memory access in all cases.  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The backtrace is identical in function sequence and source location, proving [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe patch did not intercept the problematic path.[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Areas for further investigation  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The logic in `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`: whether the `p` argument passed to `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` in all [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalling contexts is always validated.  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The boundary check in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`: consider if `pkt->pay.len` can still exceed[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe real available payload even after the patch’s `icmp_full_len` guard.  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The code paths that compute or modify `pkt->pay.len` prior to `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mespecially around fragmented packets or non‐standard IP header lengths.  [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The interaction between `[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, and whether there are[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39many alternate branches that bypass the new guards.  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Nearby constants defining `ifp->tx.len` and assumptions about buffer sizes, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhich might obscure true payload limits.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
